name: Derpy's Basics 3
description:
This mod is unfinished, as there are some assets yet to be modified

Derpy's Basics 3

Derpy's Basics 3 is the best version of Derpy yet. This mod has custom characters, custom schools, and challanges. This is probably the first mod to have two principals. This mod includes some of the characters from the original as well because I'm cool like that.

Characters

This mod features these characters. 

Dave as Principal (holy shit, how's it been, Dave)

Vice Principal as Principal (Originated from Derpy PR9)

Playtime as Playtime (Originated from Derpy PR7)

Bully as Bully (Originated from Derpy PR1)

Broom as Broom (Originated from Derpy PR1)

Derpy as Derpy (Redrawn for epic)

1st Prize as 1st Prize (Originated from Derpy PR4)

Some other characters I'll just upload screenshots of ig

Marcello as Custom Character (Weird, I had to use the Dave and Bambi mod version because funny, sorry MoldyGH)

Challanges

Small school, one room, and other challanges. These make the game fun, does it not? I spent too much time on it, hopefully you like it, or not idk. Small school tbh tho.

Source code

View the mod's source code here: https://github.com/Spongeyboi/derpybasics3
